data.name: Alone but strong
data.detailed_description:
This is a single player first-person action shooter.

  • Easy and uncomplicated to play. Not so much stealth and sniping but more of speed and action.
  • 19 levels.
  • A relatively open world allows the player to choose any path. Shoot all enemies or just run through the level.
  • A mixture of realistic environment and unrealistic enemies.
  • The humanoid enemies are zombies and biomechanical mutants.
  • A large mech fires homing missiles.
  • Another mech is armed with machine guns.
  • The humanoid enemies chase the player.
  • All enemies explode on close contact with the player.
  • The biomechanical mutants shoot fireballs.
  • Seems to work well with linux + proton.

data.short_description: A single player first-person action shooter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7(SP1)+
  • Processor: i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The computer used for the trailer has the same specifications as in the minimum system requirements.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
